title: Taliban tells CNN reporter in Kabul to stand aside because she's a woman
content:
1. Taliban tells CNN reporter in Kabul to stand aside because she's a woman  Business Insider
  2. Mainstream media crushes Biden for ‘flat-footed,’ ‘humiliating’ betrayal of Afghans as Taliban takes control  Fox News
  3. Photo shows posters of women at a Kabul beauty salon being painted over as the Taliban seized the city  Yahoo! Voices
  4. The fall of Afghanistan in 2021 is the result of years of American delusion  MSNBC
  5. What went wrong in Afghanistan?  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: タリバン、カブールでCNN記者に「女性だからどいてくれ」と指示
